page.title: 03BIOGRAPHY
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NICHOLAS. AFTERNOON. I walked through a footbath and jumped into the deep end of the swimming pool.While there we met some girls from our class.When the diving pool opened I jumped off the board as I cannot dive.I left the baths at about 4.15pm and walked home.I arrived home at about 5.30pm and had my evening meal.I ate Yorkshire Pudding,roast beef,cauliflower,cabbage,mushy peas and gravy.I was too tired to eat any sweet so I sat in the lounge in an easy chair and fell asleep while watching T.V.I woke up at about 8.30pm to find that I was too late to go to Church.I had some crisps and a drink of lemonade and watched on T.V.I went to bed at 10.30pm.
